warmup_trim_days.description: Number of days to trim from start to remove indicator warm-up period

nan_drop_threshold_per_symbol.description: Maximum NaN ratio allowed per symbol (0.05 = 5%)

global_feature_keep_ratio.description: Minimum symbol coverage required to keep feature globally (0.95 = 95%)

min_symbol_feature_coverage.description: Minimum feature coverage required to include symbol (0.90 = 90%)

use_missingness_mask.description: Whether to create _isnan columns for missing value indicators

imputation_value.description: Value to use for final imputation of missing data

manifest_path.description: Path to save/load feature manifest JSON file

detailed_logging.description: Enable detailed logging of processing decisions
